snippet: Some of the world’s most prominent multinational companies — Coca-Cola, Unilever, General Electric, Philips, Visa — have started doing business in the country.
abstract: Foreign investors set sights on Myanmar, two years after nation's civilian government came to power; some of the world’s most prominent multinational companies, including Coca-Cola, Unilever, General Electric, Philips and Visa, have begun conducting business in country.
lead_paragraph: Some of the world’s most prominent multinational companies — Coca-Cola, Unilever, General Electric, Philips, Visa — have started doing business in the country.

headline.seo: In Myanmar, Flirtations by Investors Turn Into Commitments
headline.main: In Myanmar, Flirtations by Investors Turn Into Commitments
headline.print_headline: Investors Keen on Myanmar See Inching Progress
